FuncDef:
The interface history traffic-rate statistics disable command disables a device from collecting a physical interface's historical bandwidth usage information.
The undo interface history traffic-rate statistics disable command enables a device to collect a physical interface's historical bandwidth usage information.
By default, a device is enabled to collect a physical interface's historical bandwidth usage information.
CLIs: undo interface history traffic-rate statistics disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Historical bandwidth usage information helps you learn the network quality and traffic status. By default, a device is enabled to collect a physical interface's historical bandwidth usage information. If you want to re-collect the bandwidth usage information, first run the interface history traffic-rate statistics disable command to disable the device from collecting the bandwidth usage information.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
